Jason Agel

Mixing & Recording Engineer | Music Producer

Jason Agel is a Grammy nominated engineer and musician in the New York City area, who's specialties include mixing, recording, and music production.

His talents can be heard on releases by Prince, John Legend, Bjork, Kanye West, Universal Music, Sony Music, Rocnation, and many more. A more detailed discography can be found here (PDF). Contact him today to work on your project.
